refnamediv.refpurpose: Rotate an image with a given angle

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
resourceimagerotate resourceimage floatangle intbgd_color intignore_transparent0
Rotates the image image using the given angle in degrees.
The center of rotation is the center of the image, and the rotated image may have different dimensions than the original image.

&reftitle.parameters;
&gd.image.description;
angle
Rotation angle, in degrees.
bgd_color
Specifies the color of the uncovered zone after the rotation
ignore_transparent
If set and non-zero, transparent colors are ignored (otherwise kept).

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an image resource for the rotated image, &return.falseforfailure;.
